features: Body Lotion: This raw, natural Coconut Lotion in a large pump bottle delivers luxurious moisturization for decadently pampered skin all day long; Great for all skin types and your entire family

Special Formula: This moisturizing body lotion for dry skin is crafted with antioxidant-rich Coconut Oil and Green Coffee Extract to soften, hydrate and pamper for radiant, healthy-looking skin and 48 hour moisture

Finest Ingredients: We use only the finest natural, raw ingredients for soft, hydrated and beautiful hair & skin. We support sustainable production of Shea & Cocoa Butter and Coconut Oil. You can feel good about what you put on your hair and skin

Choose What's Real: Our nourishing skin care and hair care products feature real, high-quality, plant-based ingredients. Our product line for whole body care includes body butter, creams, balms, lotions, oils, soaps, pregnancy and stretch mark care

Why Palmers? For over 180 years, Palmer's has crafted treatment-oriented beauty products using Cocoa Butter, Coconut Oil, Shea Butter, Olive Oil & Vitamin E to soothe, hydrate, soften, replenish and revitalize skin and hair
body.description: Hydrate and replenish skin with Palmer's Coconut Oil Formula daily body lotion, crafted with antioxidant-rich Coconut Oil and Green Coffee Extract for radiant, healthy-looking skin. Curious about the effects of green coffee extract on skin? Dermatologists and experts have been privy to the power of green coffee extract skin care for years, and now it's your turn. This moisturizing body lotion for dry skin delivers luxurious long lasting moisture for decadently pampered skin all day long. Proudly made in U.S.A., Palmer's has been a trusted brand for over 180 years, providing high-quality natural products that are passed down from generation to generation. America's #1 Coconut Oil Skin Care brand Palmer's Coconut Oil Formula uses the highest quality natural ingredients for superior moisturization head-to-toe.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars One of the best natural ingredient lotions!
reviews.reviewText: This lotion for its value is a S T E A L!! Why? Let me explain.I have a whole host of skin issues due to having sensitive skin. I have KP, Hyperpigmentation, Scarring, Acne, Chronic Dryness, etc. This lotion has helped me with all of those things and its ingredients are very good for you!- It doesn't have any Silicones which can clog your pores depending on your skin type or how often you lotion inbetween showers and if you use soaps that have sulfates to dissolve the silicones; so if you have a Sulfate Free bath routine; this lotion is a MUST to avoid silicones but still have super hydrated and soft skin.- The hydration literally lasts all day or sometimes almost 2 days.- The smell is a nice fresh Coconut scent; but it's light enough if you want to change up and DIY it into a scent you'd accept more; buy some lotion fragrance oils and mix a few drops in. I added Birthday Cake and Chocolate-scented drops into my Value Size bottle, so now it smells heavenly!- It (unintentionally) brightens and lightens your skin slowly over time. This lotion has a lot of brightening ingredients in it; I'm not sure if Palmer's knew that or if they used these ingredients for their other great factors and nutrients to the skin. But my KP and body scars are slowly starting to fade with the consistent use of this lotion.Here are some very minor Cons of the lotion:- It is a very heavy and thick lotion that WILL hydrate your life better than a hot date on a Saturday night. Because of this, it's great as a winter, fall, and spring moisturizer, but summer? Use it sparingly or try not to go too heavy with it! You'll feel lubed up for dayssss. Unless you like that sorta thing~- I saw people complain about the smell. I personally don't mind the mild scent of Coconut. However, I am a Gourmand queen and I love smelling like I got dipped in chocolate, nutty, cookie batter goodness. Like in my Pros section above. Just add some fragrance oils meant to be added to lotions and spruce it up a bit! Be sure to patch test as you mix to make sure your skin won't be irritated. I recommend taking out a bit of lotion and mixing it separately and see how it fairs with your skin before committing to transforming your whole bottle.All in all. I L O V E this lotion, and nothing will separate it from me. It's a keeper~

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect body lotion with a great scent!
reviews.reviewText: Palmer's Coconut Oil Formula Body Lotion is my absolute favorite lotion. It provides deep hydration and leaves my skin feeling incredibly soft and nourished. The coconut oil-infused formula has a delightful tropical scent that instantly transports me to a beachside paradise. I especially appreciate how it quickly absorbs into my skin without feeling greasy, making it perfect for daily use. It has been a lifesaver during dry, winter months and has significantly improved the overall texture and moisture levels of my skin. Palmer's Coconut Oil Formula Body Lotion is a skincare must-have, and I highly recommend it to anyone in need of intense hydration and a delightful fragrance.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars product smells absolutely amazing and feels very nice to apply
reviews.reviewText: i loved the scent a lot!! it smells so refreshing and comforting, and the texture of the lotion and oil is nice. it leaves a nice moisturizing feel after applying to the skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: First off I love that all the alcohols are long chain, Palmers has been around for a 175 years, if it was complete dross they wouldn’t have survived all these years. My mum always had the stick of Palmers cocoa butter. This coconut oil formula with green coffee smells wonderful, warm & rich. My husband wants one lotion for his face and body and he loves this. I love it too. It’s economical, nourishing, smells beautiful and complements my warm perfumes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works but not the scent for me.
reviews.reviewText: It works well but I don’t like the faint coffee scent in it (fair since I don’t like coffee, my mistake!) I’m saving it for when I’m putting clothes on right away. It’s a good back up lotion. Strong scent. Moisturizing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great scent and leaves skin soft
reviews.reviewText: It feels like a heavier lotion but it absorbs so fast and leaves skin very soft. I love this lotion and the scent. Great price too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice texture and smell
reviews.reviewText: Nice cream, I have never tried before and I really liked it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Feels Good, Readily Absorbed, Not Greasy
reviews.reviewText: This is a really good value. It feels great and the scent is pleasant. The affordable price encourages you to indulge a bit and your skin appreciates it.
This is a fantastic body lotion, I use high end products have stopped buying expensive body lotions because this is legit fantastically mosturizing and smells like Sol DJ Bum Bum cream!

I used to buy Aveeno coconut body lotion until they changed it to unscented. I have sensitive skin so I wanted to try a lotion that was organic, so I found Palmers on Amazon.Its soft, not greasy at all and spread nice and evenly. My skin went from almost dry to being soft again.I would definitely buy it again.I live in Canada and it came all the way from Illinois. I found out later that I can purchase it for half the price at Walmart. But I also saw that is comes in a much larger bottle for $39.99, which I would buy in an instant on this website.You won't be sorry if you purchase it.
Deja la piel muy bien humectada y el aroma es muy rico
Mädels holt euch die...Die ist echt super da sie schnell einzieht und dazu auch noch sehr gut richt.Macht die Haut schön weich...Hab mir direkt 2 Flaschen bestellt.Bin voll zufrieden
